nodes.text: Gleed Ontondon was a large creature of unknown origin who was a member of the Bounty Hunters' Guild and Guild Council. At some point during Cradossk's tenure as Head of the Guild, Ontondon had served as Deputy Chief Executive, and contributed to the Bounty Hunters Guild Handbook's introductory section concerning the basics of bounty hunting.

After the death of Cradossk, he became the spokesperson for the True Guild, a splinter faction that had formed after the Trandoshan's death. The True Guild did not recognize Cradossk's son, Bossk, as the new Guild leader, which irritated Bossk greatly.

Gleed eventually became the go-between for the guild and Kud'ar Mub'at, but began to embezzle a portion of the funds, leaving a small fortune for himself on the side. After the dissolution of the True Guild, Ontondon took the rest of the Guild's built-up funds and went into hiding, leaving the rest of his associates with nothing.
Ontondon was a fearsome-looking humanoid with leathery skin and a spiked skull. He was also distinguishable by his hands, which were tipped with short claws.
